io.soliton.protobuf

Interface ServerMethod<I,O>


  • public interface ServerMethod<I,O>
    Represents a method on the server side of the RPC system.
    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message.Builder inputBuilder()
      Returns a builder capable of building this method's input parameter.
      Parser<I> inputParser()
      Returns a parser capable of parsing this method's input parameter.
      ListenableFuture<O> invoke(I request)
      Invokes this method with the given parameter.
      String name()
      Returns the name of this method.

    • Method Detail

        Returns a builder capable of building this method's input parameter.

      • invoke

        ListenableFuture<O> invoke(I request)
        Invokes this method with the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        request - the parameter received from the client
